summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 14, Law's Addition, being the alley between 17th Avenue North and 18th Avenue North, from East Republican Street to East Mercer Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 106618 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and repealing Ordinance No. 53135, approved June 14th, 1927.
